recommendations.recommendation: I never write any Recommendations but i must step in hear i thought this anime is a complete ***** but after watching the first episode i changed my mind, despite the absurd idea this anime is a lot more interesting than it appears. Besides i like when bad guys become good, Definitely recommended, Go new Doronbow Gang !!!

anime.description: Long, long ago, a pair of heroes called the Yatterman faced off against the mischievous Doronbow Gang, led by the sexy villainess Doronjo. Now, years later, the Yatter Kingdom is protected by the new Yatterman. But the mysterious new Yatterman have forced the Yatter people into labor, and unrest runs rampant throughout the kingdom. In the spirit of her predecessor, a young new Doronjo reforms the Doronbow Gang in rebellion against the Yatterman. Source: FUNimation

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: 湯けむり露天風呂紀行
Steamy Outdoor Hot Spring Trip
Yukemuri Rotenburou Kikou
episode.summary: Doronjo and the gang come to know a couple when they stop by a village. When the wife goes to collect firewood, she offers to take them to a hot spring. Then, when they come back, they see her husband being taken away by the Yatter soldiers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺たちは天使じゃないけど天使のフリをする
We`re Not Angels But We`ll Pretend to Be
Oretachi wa Tenshi ja Nai kedo Tenshi no Furi o Suru
episode.summary: After being defeated by Yatter soldiers, Doronjo, Boyacky and Tonzra find a house to hide. There, they meet Alouette, who mistakes them for angels. She thinks that they are there to grant her wish to be reunited with her parents. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤッターマンにデコピンを
We`ll Give Yatterman a Forehead Flicking
Yatterman ni Dekopin o
episode.summary: After forming a new Doronbow, Doronjo, Boyacky and Tonzra finally enter Yatter Kingdom in order to give a forehead flicking to Yatterman. However, after the fight, they realize something that they had never even thought of. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界は真っ暗闇
The World Is Pitch-Black
Sekai wa Makkurayami
episode.summary: Leopard is a descendant of Doronjo, who led a group of thieves called Doronbow. After coming to hold a grudge against Yatterman, she calls herself Doronjo and forms a new Doronbow, together with the descendants of Doronjo’s underlings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クッシャロデッシャロ湖のクッシー
Kussie of Lake Kussharo-Dessharo
Kussharodessharo-ko no Kusshi
episode.summary: The gang takes a break from their traveling in order for Doronjo to rest and recover from a cold. While Galina tries to tend to Doronjo, Alouette goes to a river to get some water. There, she meets a creature that was separated from its mother. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢の海
Dream Sea
Yume no Umi
episode.summary: The gang comes to a seashore where a wall divides the open sea and the inland sea. Due to their hunger, they get woozy and mistake Ryu, a fisherman, for a turtle, and rescue him from Yatter soldiers, hoping that he’ll take them to the Sea God’s Palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冬に咲く花
The Flower That Blooms in Winter
Fuyu ni Saku Hana
episode.summary: General Goro persistently pursues Doronjo and her gang, putting them in constant danger. Out of concern for Doronjo’s safety, Boyacky and Tonzra suggest that they temporarily give up on trying to give Yatterman a forehead flicking. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 母に捧げるハリケーン
The Hurricane Dedicated to His Mother
Haha ni Sasageru Hurricane
episode.summary: Doronjo and her gang visit a town where a snow festival is being held. There, they meet Takeshi, who tells them that he’s going to enter one of the martial arts tournaments. After they find out that there are rewards, Galina ends up entering as well. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夜明け
The Dawn
Yoake
episode.summary: After being attacked and falling into a lake, Doronjo and the gang manage to survive. Doronjo comes to realize that in order to change the world, people need to be told the truth about Yatterman; however, no one believes what Doronbow has to say. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真実のヤッター・メトロポリス
The Truth About Yatter Metropolis
Shinjitsu no Yatter Metropolis
episode.summary: Doronjo and her gang were taken to see Yatterman although the one who actually greeted them was Dokurobey. Stunned by the situation, they ask him to explain what is going on. There, Dokurobey starts telling his story of how he ended being there. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤッター十二神将包囲網
The Twelve Yatter Guardian Gods` Encirclement
Yatter Juunijinshou Houi Ami
episode.summary: Doronbow finally reaches Yatter Metropolis. When they see people being forced to work for Yatterman, Doronjo renews her vow to bring down Yatterman and they sneak into Yatterman’s palace, where they’re met by the Twelve Yatter Guardian Gods. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アバレシ番外地
Abareshi Prison
Abareshi Bangaichi
episode.summary: After a series of failures, General Goro becomes serious about pursuing Doronjo and her gang. Realizing that this is his last chance to make up for his failures, he sets a trap in a small town, which leads to his success in capturing Doronbow. Source: crunchyroll
